pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a sleek, high-speed train at the architecturally modern Liège-Guillemins station in Belgium. The futuristic, white, open-air structure of the station contrasts with the traditional city visible in the background. The train begins to pull away from the platform where a few travelers are walking.
